content: Right index and middle finger triggering
title: Chief Complaint

content: The patient is a 1:15-year-old male with a history of a left upper extremity fracture, status post long arm cast immobilization. He reports that his right index and middle fingers have recently started triggering. The onset is recent, with no prior history of similar symptoms. The patient is seeking evaluation and management for this new issue. No specific mechanism of injury is reported for the triggering. No prior treatment has been initiated for this condition. The symptoms are currently present and ongoing.
